root.name: PRadioButtonGroup
root.description: A PRadioButtonGroup identifies a set of PRadioButton components such that only one in the group can be selected at any time. Create a new PRadioButtonGroup object for each group and pass it into the constructor for the individual PRadioButtons it should manage.

method.mdescription: Adds a radio button to this group.
Removes a radio button from this group.
De-selects all the radio buttons in this group.
Returns the selected radio button in the group.
